attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Like the PM reads them anyway. Stop signing online petitions and get off your arses and go and do something real about what you care about. You can make a change, but not like this.

Don't give anyone in a position of power the smug feeling they've engaged with voters just by "reading" this constant stream of petitions. There's more than 4,500 of them on this site alone!!! Don't give them free market research. They can work for their jobs. At this rate, soon there will be a Minister For Petitions, at great cost to us the taxpayers. 

Go and do something real that engages with people and share your passion, your knowledge, your feelings, and really make a change.

Thanks

Strummerbus

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
